title: How to Make a Red Velvet Microwavable Mug Cake

steps.headline: Beat the ingredients in a large, microwavable mug.
steps.description: Whisk together the oil, buttermilk, egg, vanilla, and food coloring using a fork.

steps.headline: Pour in the dry ingredients.
steps.description: Add the cinnamon, salt, cocoa powder, baking powder, sugar, and flour into the wet ingredients. Beat well until properly combined.

steps.headline: Microwave the mug cake for about 50 seconds to a minute.
steps.description: Every microwave is different when it comes to its cooking times, but the mug cake will take approximately a minute to fully cook.

steps.headline: Allow the mug cake to cool for several minutes.
Serve.
steps.description: Add frosting or whipped cream on the mug cake. Garnish with chocolate chips, coconut flakes, or chocolate shavings if desired. Enjoy!

text: Beat the ingredients in a large, microwavable mug. Whisk together the oil, buttermilk, egg, vanilla, and food coloring using a fork. Pour in the dry ingredients. Add the cinnamon, salt, cocoa powder, baking powder, sugar, and flour into the wet ingredients. Beat well until properly combined. Microwave the mug cake for about 50 seconds to a minute. Every microwave is different when it comes to its cooking times, but the mug cake will take approximately a minute to fully cook. Allow the mug cake to cool for several minutes.  Serve. Add frosting or whipped cream on the mug cake. Garnish with chocolate chips, coconut flakes, or chocolate shavings if desired. Enjoy!
